name: SampCloud
description:
Musicians face particularly uncertain times. While venues remain closed around the world, artists are asking themselves: How can I continue to support myself without touring?


Inspired by the existing platform and pioneer for indie artists SoundCloud, SampCloud proposes additions to the platform which would offer new creative possibilities, while also generating income for musicians, sound-designers and foley artists. Ideally, SampCloud would present an alternative to subscription-based services.
